title: Denis Shapovalov puts his memory to test
description: Is Denis Shapovalov’s memory as sharp as his backhand? From recalling his first ATP Tour match to looking back at his 2017 Omnium Banque National présenté par Rogers semi-final run, the former No. 10 in the PIF ATP Rankings tests his knowledge and answers questions about his career in a special ‘Five To Win’ challenge. How did he do? Watch the full video below to find out!   [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Player Features

Watch the ATP Tour video feature below

February 25, 2025

ATP Tour

Denis Shapovalov is a three-time tour-level titlist. By ATP Staff

Is Denis Shapovalov’s memory as sharp as his backhand?

From recalling his first ATP Tour match to looking back at his 2017 Omnium Banque National présenté par Rogers semi-final run, the former No. 10 in the PIF ATP Rankings tests his knowledge and answers questions about his career in a special ‘Five To Win’ challenge.

How did he do? Watch the full video below to find out!
